name: Colour Crazy
description:
How well do you know your colours?

Pick the right colour, it's as simple as that. But of course nothing is as simple as it seems. Add a few twists to the mix and suddenly picking out the right colour may not seem so straight forward.

Sharpen your skills in practice mode, then challenge your friends in competitive mode to fight for the highest score. Climb the leaderboard and boast your new highscore on Facebook.

Features:

  • Competitive and Practice modes
  • 13 of your favourite colours to unlock.
  • Touch controls even your grandma can handle.
  • Facebook powered Leaderboard. **

* Colours may not be your favourite
** Friends not included

NOTE: For your score to be seen on your friends leaderboard, please select "Friends" in privacy settings when Colour Crazy first connects.
